flawed_nl_solution:
Since a year has 365 days, the total television production in the first year is 10*365 = <<10*365=3650>>3650
In the second year, they reduced the total television production by 1/10*3650 = <<1/10*3650=36500>>36500
The total television production in the second year was 3650-36500 = <<3650-36500=-32850>>-32850.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 365, not 36500. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
